resources.string: Looks like you have frost pro! We\'ll reload the app so you can enjoy the awesome features!

Thank you for your support! Enjoy all the features in Frost.

If you like this app, please consider rating it and supporting this open source project.

If you have comments, please do not hesitate to contact me!
It seems like you are a pro user, but we couldn\'t find your purchasing info. If this error persists, please try clearing the Play Store cache and reinstalling the app.

It seems like this app version can\'t purchase pro. Please reinstall from the play store if this is a persistent issue. \nIf you would like to donate without any additional features, you may do so through PayPal.
Frost Pro has been restored. Enjoy the features!
It seems like you don\'t have pro. If this is a persistent issue, contact me and attach your purchase receipt.
